updateToast.body: A new version of the app is available

connectWalletPage.body: 100% Free. Open Source. Community Owned. Non-Custodial. Private.
connectWalletPage.header: Please connect a wallet to get started

earn.earnBody: Earn interest on your crypto assets.

farming.body: You are not currently farming anything.

stakingVaults.body: Explore opportunities to earn interest on your crypto assets.

pools.body: You have not deposited into any liquidity pools.

trade.needPermission: We need your permission to use your %{symbol}
trade.whyNeedThis: Why do I need to do this?

tooltip.rate: This is the expected rate for this trade pair.
tooltip.minerFee: This is the fee to process the transaction on the blockchain, this is not a fee charged by ShapeShift.
tooltip.shapeshiftFee: ShapeShift adds no fees on trades ðŸŽ‰

errors.title: Something went wrong
errors.notEnoughEth: Not enough ETH for the gas fee on this transaction.
errors.amountToSmall: Amount too small. The minimum trade amount for this pair is %{minLimit}.
errors.negativeMax: Not enough funds for the miner fee on this transaction. Est miner fee %{estimatedMinerFee}
errors.invalidMax: Invalid Amount. The maximum trade amount for this pair is %{maxLimit}.
errors.insufficientFunds: Insufficient funds for miner fee and amount
errors.insufficientFundsForLimit: Insufficient funds. The minimum trade amount for this pair is %{minLimit}
errors.insufficientFundsForAmount: Insufficient funds. Your %{symbol} balance is less than the selected amount
errors.overMaxSlippage: This trade would result in over %{slippagePercentage}% slippage. Please trade a lower amount for a better price
errors.balanceToLow: Balance too low. The minimum trade amount for this pair is %{minLimit}
errors.quoteFailed: An error occurred getting a quote for your trade.

errors.unknown: There was an error submitting your passphrase
errors.empty: You are using an empty passphrase

passphrase.body: After submitting your passphrase, use the button on the KeepKey to approve it

password.body: Enter your password to decrypt your wallet

error.length: Your password must be at least %{length} characters

receive.onlySend: Only send %{asset} (%{symbol}) to this address. Sending any other coins may result in permanent loss.
receive.copyFailed: Failed to copy %{symbol} receive address to clipboard

deposit.footerDisclaimer: By continuing you agree to our terms of service.

withdraw.footerDisclaimer: This transaction will require one transaction gas fee.

approve.body: We need your permission to use your %{asset}
approve.learnMore: Why do I need to do this?
approve.depositFee: There will be separate gas fee to deposit.

errors.walletNotFound: Unable to communicate with your wallet

errors.unknown: An unexpected error occurred communicating with your KeepKey
errors.pinInvalid: The PIN you entered is not valid
errors.pinMismatch: The two PINs you entered do not match

connect.body: Connect a KeepKey device and click 'Pair.'

pin.body: Use PIN layout shown on your device to find the location to press on the pin pad.

newPin.body: Use PIN layout shown on your device to find the location to press on the pin pad.

newPinConfirm.body: Use PIN layout shown on your device to find the location to press on the pin pad.

errors.unknown: An unexpected error occurred communicating with MetaMask

connect.body: Click Pair and login to MetaMask from the popup window

errors.unknown: An unexpected error occurred communicating with Portis

connect.body: Click Pair then select Portis from the popup window

error.delete: Unable to delete your wallet, sorry.

load.body: Loading your saved wallet... Enter your password when prompted.

import.body: Enter your seed phrase to import an existing wallet

password.body: Enter a password to encrypt your wallet. This is how you will access your wallet. Do not forget this password.

create.body: Write these 12 words down and store them securely offline. This 12 word phrase is used to recover your wallet private keys.

start.body: You can have multiple ShapeShift wallets. You may load a wallet, import a wallet from a backup phrase, or create a new wallet.

success.encryptingWallet: Encrypting your wallet... if your browser asks to store data in persistent storage, please click 'Allow'.
success.error: There was an error connecting your wallet

selectModal.body: By connecting a wallet, you agree to ShapeShift's Terms of Service and acknowledge that you have read and understand the ShapeShift disclaimer.

rewards.currentAPYLabel: The current APY for your rewards

assetCards.stakingBody: Earn passive income by staking or depositing your assets into a vault.
